channel.title: Comments on: Nicole by OPI in Pick of the Glitter

item.title: By: Effy Stonem
item.dc:creator: Effy Stonem
item.description: Trick for easy glitter polish removal. Before putting the glitter polish on, paint on a base coat of Elmer's Glue. The glue peels off easily when you're ready to ditch the glitter paint, and the glitter comes right off with it. YOU'RE WELCOME.
item.content:encoded: Trick for easy glitter polish removal. Before putting the glitter polish on, paint on a base coat of Elmer’s Glue. The glue peels off easily when you’re ready to ditch the glitter paint, and the glitter comes right off with it. YOU’RE WELCOME.
